dapps.name: Security
dapps.update:
- Using divide forward slash and comments now work together
 - Clean script now works successfully when using brackets in a function

dapps.name: Filez
dapps.about: Filez is a simple file manager that allows you to:
- Upload and download files between your phone and desktop
- Export backups or transactions to the MiniDapp by specifying the Filez path.
dapps.update: - New title bar that only shows when tapping the top of the screen (Android only)
- Console logs now available from title bar
